column5: Havent been out fishing since the last salmon caught in late September. Lots of open river to fish still. January 1st is ice time.
Oh. Perch and crappie will be calling your name long before then Â Lol

Any ice that did form in the Kawarthas melted this week with 6* weather and rain. Theres no ice anywhere near me, and I'm surrounded by lakes. Lots of open water right now. Its only November. You could probably shore fish for pan fish (just remember lots of rivers are sanctuaries in November.)
Brian, river fishing is too stressfulÂ ðŸ¤£
Thanks for the replies.Â  Plan was to get out in the second week of December. Hopefully we get some cold weather and some solid ice somewhere close!
I can boat to my dock in Temagami.. don't get yourself in a hurry and WET !
